amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for obligation to any entity that commenced a case in fiscal year 2013, 2014, or before the date such funds would otherwise be so obligated in fiscal year 2015.

action.text: Mr. Simpson raised a point of order against the Burgess amendment (A051). Mr. Simpson stated that the provisions of the amendment seek to change existing law and constitute legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
